Name: Output File Name
Description: Where to output the obfuscated BSP to.
Warning: Overrides the original BSP by default! Might end up in the CompileLogs folder.

Name: Entity Relocation
Description: Any non-postional entities will be moved to the origin (0, 0, 0).
Warning: Entities are relocated BEFORE they are extracted!

Name: Entity Extraction
Description: Enables entity extraction (useful for server specific maps!).
Warning: Tiny bit experimental, should work 100% of them time!

Name: Entity Garbage
Description: Adds garbage entities across the map (messages, manhacks, klaxon)

Name: Crash Game
Description: Enables crashing the game upon load of BSP (without the original .lmp file)

Name: Entity Tag
Description: The message to display on screen and across the map.
